detailsOfAchievement: The mission of knowledge and care is achieved through Sahay, Upachar, Aanchal, Parvarish and Vidya projects. We provide timely, adequate treatment and rehabilitation to needy children and adults suffering from debilitating neurological illnesses. These activities conducted in economically disadvantaged communities in urban, rural and tribal areas have impacted more than 20000 beneficiaries. We also conduct continuing medical education programmes for neurologists and allied medical personnel.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Neurology Foundation is charitable trust. the foundation focuses on reaching out to patients suffering from Neurological disorders including Alzheimers disease,Stroke,Parkinso`s disease,Multiple Sclerosis,Epilepsy and cerebral palsy amongst many others. Neurology Foundation ,believe in the twin principles of knowledge and care.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: In March 2015 a music festival “CHIRANTAN” was conducted at Canara Union Hall, Bengaluru. This festival was opened with vocal khayal recital by Smt. Priyadarshini Kulkarni followed by Dhrupad recital by Pt. Ramakant Gundecha and Pt. Umakant Gundecha. The pakhawaj accompaniment was provided by Pt. Akhilesh Gundecha. Smt Priyadarshini kulkarni was accompanied by Shri Gurumurthy Vaidya on Tabala and Ravindra Katoti on thr Harmonium.

In the year 2014-15, a music festival “ARPAN” was conducted to commemorate Pt. Mallikarjun Mansur’s death anniversary at Pune. Well known musician of national and international repute were invited to perform in this festival. Stalwarts like Panduta Malini Rajurkar, Pandita N. Rajam, Pt Biswajit Roy Chowdhury give high standard performances enthralling the audience. The programme received huge response from the public and media. This programme had a free entry for all music lovers.

The delhi chapter of memorial festivals “SANSMARAN” was presented at Habitat World Centre, Lodhi Road, N. Delhi in the month of February 2017. This two day two session music festival. Smt. Priyadarshini Kulkarni presented her vocal concert accompanied on the tabala by pandit Vinod Lele and Smt. Paromita Mukharji on the Harmonium. The evening conducted with Mohan Vina recital by Padmashree Pandit Vishwa Mohan Bhatt. He was accompanied by Pt. Ramkumar Mishra on the tabala

After that in 4 march 2007 they started â€œJeevan Shikshan Matimand Vidyalay (Nivasi)â€ for 55 Handicapped Mentally Retarded Childrenâ€™s. detailsOfAchievement: Institute imparts training in Life Skills, Hard Skills and Soft Skills. Institute is working in Skill, Vocational Training and Development, Youth Employment in order to increase the employability of youth. Institute is also Working on Women Empowerment. Institute has been conducting Training courses to gain employability under CSR and Govt. Funds Institute is also registered with different govt. organizations as Vocational Training Provider. In this capacity training and placement activity is carried on in sectors such as Information and Communication Technology, Retail, Construction, Agriculture, Business and Commerce, Accounting and Banking, Soft Skills etc. Health and Welfare Programmes for Construction Labour, Adolescents and Women are conducted. Till date institute has trained more than 15000 trainees in above mentioned Sectors under vocational training.

title: NIRAMAY PUNE
detailsOfAchievement: 1) CHILD HEALTH CARD SCHEME(CHCS) i.e. IMMUNIZATION PROGRAM: To provide free immunization to the children of the age 0 to 6 and would be mothers. Also to provide awareness about health and hygiene. Infrastructure & staff: We have two well equipped dispensaries along with a team of medical officers, medical assistants. Each mobile dispensary has a fixed schedule of slum visit for 5 weeks. The schedule is attached with the document. Monitoring: There is one medical officer as a in charge of the mobile dispensary. He / she is responsible for all the operations on the mobile van. Reporting: Monthly report of all these three projects is reported to all the donors and the members of the board of trustees as well as to Pune Municipal Corporation. Till date could register 35000 children 2) KISHORI SHAKTI PROJECT Initially we have started this program in 7 slums. In which we are running daily classes for our beneficiaries i.e. adolescent girls. We are focusing on life skills training programs such as self awareness, body language, self presentation, interpersonal relationship, assertiveness, coping with emotions, empathy, problem solving, goal setting and decision making, creative thinking, critical thinking etc. Introduction to sensitive topics like HIV, birth control techniques etc are being introduced at appropriate stage. Also conducts introductory program to inform about the legal provision for crime related to women. Now the same program is conducted in 9 slums in Pune Municipal Corporation area. 3) HEALTH AWARENESS PROGRAM and TRAINING OF ANGANWADI WORKERS Since last four years Niramay is conducting free immunization program for children of the age 0 to 6 years in the slums of Pune Municipal corporation area. While conducting the activity, our team noticed some of the most common things about health and hygiene in all these community. We used to conduct the immunization activity with the help of Anganwadi workers of ICDS. The supervisors and the CDPOs of these ICDS projects requested Niramay to conduct health awareness activity in these slums and also to conduct training of Anganwadi workers on health related topics. Initially Niramay conducted awareness activity on topics like nutritious diet, awareness about need and benefits of proper breast feeding, how to prevent rainy season diseases, water borne diseases, viral, contagious, diseases related with the reproductive organs, disease related with the various addiction , HIV AIDS, health problem related with women and girl child, swine flu etc. The team on two mobile dispensaries used to counsel the parents on various health related problems. 1. Impact of our work has created 1) Vaccination(CHCS): Till date we have reached more than 30000 children and in a year we would definitely reach more than 40000 children in a span of a year. Conducting the program in 135 slums and 21 construction site. 2) Kishori Shakti Project: Initially started the program in seven slums from Pune city. Now reaching to 10 slums from Pune Municipal corporation area. Daily classes are conducted to train the adolescent girls about life skills. In each slums average 30 adolescent girls attend the classes and in some occasions more than 100 girls from each slums participate in the activities. Now parents initiative is increasing and more & more girls are joining this Kishori Shakti Movement.
